me_self: You ramble on to yourself, having found a captive audience.
actor_room: $n rambles on about a boring exploit.
actor_self: $n begins rambling on to himself about something.  You aren't interested enough to find out what.
actor_other: $n blithers on and on to $N about something.
actor_me: $n tells you a rather boring tale, you feign interest.
me_actor: You ramble on to $N about your past adventures.
